display.title: Gregicality Multiblocks
description: If you want a big boost to your processing abilities, look no further than these powerful Multiblocks!
Formerly known as &&2Gregicality Multiblocks&&r, the add-on has been fully integrated into GregTech CEu Modern!
You'll need to make use of many new &&9alloys&&r to build the new Multiblocks. Yay, more content!
&&6This quest unlocks a new tutorial on the GCYM mechanics in the &&lTips and Tricks&&r&&6 tab - check it out to learn more!&&r
